snippet: The workshop at Parsons the New School for Design was to be given by John Galliano, formerly the chief designer at Christian Dior, who was dismissed in 2011 after going on an anti-Semitic tirade in a bar.
abstract: Parsons the New School for Design in Manhattan cancels four-day workshop and discussion that was to be lead by controversial fashion designer John Galliano, former chief designer at Christian Dior; Galliano was dismissed in 2011 after going on an anti-Semitic tirade in a bar.
lead_paragraph: The workshop at Parsons the New School for Design was to be given by John Galliano, formerly the chief designer at Christian Dior, who was dismissed in 2011 after going on an anti-Semitic tirade in a bar.

headline.seo: Parsons School for Design Cancels Visit by Galliano
headline.main: Designer Won’t Hold Workshop at Parsons
headline.print_headline: Designer Won’t Hold Workshop At Parsons

keywords.value: Parsons the New School for Design
keywords.name: organizations
